titleStmt.title: A treatise of Antichrist Conteyning the defence of Cardinall Bellarmines arguments, which inuincibly demonstrate, that the pope is not Antichrist. Against M. George Downam D. of Diuinity, who impugneth the same. By Michael Christopherson priest. The first part.
titleStmt.author: Walpole, Michael, 1570-1624?

publicationStmt.date: Imprinted with Licence, M. DC. XIII. [1613]

notesStmt.note: Printer and place of publication from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Reel guide incorrectly lists item in postion 1588:6.
